Articles.Content: Chobit, just wondering, when and how did you get the idea for PfL?

Chobit, just wondering, when and how did you get the idea for PfL?

It kinda just was thrown together from bits and pieces of nothingness. Originally I was only going to do one image, then Skunky gave it a shoutout on one of his streams. Then I made a few more, then a few mores, then I thought maybe some story to it wouldn't hurt, then my brain, known for it's extravagant universe building, just sort of pieces together random thoughts and ideas until BAM! PfL!!!

It kinda just was thrown together from bits and pieces of nothingness. Originally I was only going to do one image, then Skunky gave it a shoutout on one of his streams. Then I made a few more, then a few mores, then I thought maybe some story to it wouldn't hurt, then my brain, known for it's extravagant universe building, just sort of pieces together random thoughts and ideas until BAM! PfL!!!

Add an April fool's joke (the visual novel, if anyone remembers), then subtract it again. Except the idea formed in my head and I pestered Chobit until I got volunteered.
I still haven't the faintest idea about what the picture was. Hint?
Oh that too, the VN would work, but it's a LOT of work for one person to code, even if Trekkette did as much helping as possible
If you're using Java, I might be able to help out?
Nah, the VN was on the Ren'Py engine. It's easy to use, but a LOT of work
Then why didnt you do something like bobcat's community ISS mod, where somebody adds something to it then somebody else adds a bit more?
How exactly will the story and such fit in with the pictures? Will a picture be released along with some fiction directly relating to the contents?

How exactly will the story and such fit in with the pictures? Will a picture be released along with some fiction directly relating to the contents?

hahahaahahaha

I doubt it.
Thread unlocked again after a cooldown period.
Thank you

What was.... Cooldown period? Why a need for a cooldown?

Did the thread overheat?
That is not to be discussed
Has the recent spectacle affected the release schedule in any way? Still looking forward to more art once you finish your, ah, "commission".

Has the recent spectacle affected the release schedule in any way? Still looking forward to more art once you finish your, ah, "commission".

Chobit's coming over to my place this afternoon. Progress not guaranteed, but likely.

Since my most resent post was deleted (again), I suppose I'll start using carrier pigeons to tell everyone what happened.

I'll be at Trekkette's today from this point on. Guys, please avoid getting my thread locked AGAIN while I'm out...

I thought carrier pigeons went extinct about a decade or two ago?

No those were Passenger Pigeons, Carrier Pigeons are trained Pigeons that deliver messages.

Oooooo, maybe I should have Trekkette write a carrier pigeon scene into the fic!

No those were Passenger Pigeons, Carrier Pigeons are trained Pigeons that deliver messages.

Oooooo, maybe I should have Trekkette write a carrier pigeon scene into the fic!

Oh, Yeah. Derp. I think They were the same thing in my head because passenger pigeons were used as carrier pigeons.

I'm not sure how that would work. Partly because I doubt pigeons are native to Laythe, or Kerbin for that matter.
Yeah, I've been wondering about what kind of wildlife I could paint for Kerbin and Laythe
How about fish, corral, small rodents and grasses and bushes?... -ish ofcourse

I was thinking they'd be Very colorful versions of the terror bird.

And also Large sea creatures, as Laythe is mostly ocean.
